review: The Fire TV Stick works great, but I feel like they need more TV-related apps.  Specifically I'd like to see more apps that can stream content from more networks, such as Comedy Central, MTV, Discovery, TBS, etc.  I know these apps are available for other devices and allow you to stream full episodes and clips for free (or with a valid cable subscription), so I'd like to see them available for the Amazon Fire TV stick as well.  I do know that hulu plus is available, but even if I were to purchase a subscription, I still would not be able to stream all the shows I'd like to since not all of the shows I watch are on hulu.  At the time of this writing, I know it's still a fairly new device/service, so I'm sure some of these apps will eventually become available.  But other than that, no complaints here!
author: Tyler
